name: DNAFeaturesGL
description: Graphical library that allows to facilitate the drawing of genetic elements (graphical representation) by means of its functions. Some of these elements: Gene, Operon, Terminator, Riboswitch.
author: Lizeth Arizmendi <liz.arizmendi13@gmail.com>, Gabriel Alarc√≥n <galarcon@ccg.unam.mx>
